title: OpenAI Is Worth 730 Billion ðŸ¤¯
narration: OpenAI just raised one hundred and ten billion dollars in a single round. That values the company at seven hundred and thirty billion. More than ninety percent of all public companies on Earth. A chatbot company is now worth more than most countries GDP. And it still has not made a profit.
videoPrompt: Cinematic vertical video, multi-scene transitions. Scene 1: massive futuristic server room with glowing blue lights stretching infinitely, camera dolly forward. Scene 2: golden coins and hundred dollar bills raining down in slow motion against black background. Scene 3: aerial shot of Silicon Valley at sunset, gleaming glass towers reflecting orange light. Scene 4: close-up of a glowing AI neural network pulsing with energy, camera slowly pulling back to reveal it is inside a vault made of gold bars. Photorealistic, dramatic lighting, cool blue and warm gold color palette.
